pages.text: Wood is an excellent natural conductor of energy and the most accessible material for crafting wands, staffs, and other artifacts. $(br2)This makes any wood an ideal choice for practitioners wishing to master the creation of magical items that focus the flow of magic.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The core of any staff is a properly dried wood core. $(br)$(l:components/salt)Salt$() combined with the $(l:odour_extracting/collected_odours#wasteland_wind)Wasteland Wind$() excels at processing branches, removing the last traces of moisture.
